Double-hang rods and adjustable shelving make use of every inch from floor to ceiling.

Popular Features for Reach-In Closets

Every reach-in closet is unique, but these features are consistently popular for maximizing space and improving organization.

Double-Hang Rods

Perfect for shirts, blouses, and pants. Doubles your hanging capacity without taking up additional floor space.

  • Adjustable height settings
  • Heavy-duty construction
  • Chrome or brushed nickel finish
  • Accommodates different garment lengths

Adjustable Shelves

Customize your storage as your needs change. Perfect for folded clothes, linens, and storage bins.

  • Easy height adjustment
  • Multiple finish options
  • Various depth configurations
  • Weight-rated for heavy items

Shoe Cubbies & Displays

Keep shoes organized and easily accessible with dedicated storage solutions.

  • Individual shoe cubbies
  • Angled display shelves
  • Pull-out shoe drawers
  • Boot storage options

Built-In Drawers & Baskets

Ideal for undergarments, accessories, and small items that need to stay organized.

  • Soft-close drawer slides
  • Divider inserts available
  • Wire or solid basket options
  • Various sizes and configurations

Slim-Profile Doors

Maximize space in tight areas with doors that don't interfere with room layout.

  • Bi-fold door options
  • Sliding door systems
  • Open access configurations
  • Custom sizing available

Accessory Storage

Specialized storage for belts, ties, jewelry, and other accessories.

  • Pull-out tie racks
  • Belt hooks and organizers
  • Jewelry trays and compartments
  • Valet rods for next-day outfits

Perfect Applications for Reach-In Closets

Our reach-in closet systems work beautifully in various spaces throughout your home.

Kids' Rooms

Growing children need adaptable storage. Our systems adjust as they grow from toddler clothes to teen wardrobes.

  • Lower hanging rods for easy access
  • Toy and game storage
  • Adjustable shelving for changing needs
  • Durable finishes that withstand daily use

Guest Rooms

Create a welcoming space for visitors while maintaining storage for your own seasonal items.

  • Dedicated guest hanging space
  • Luggage storage areas
  • Seasonal item organization
  • Easy-to-use systems for guests

Hallway Closets

Transform narrow hallway closets into efficient storage for coats, cleaning supplies, or linens.

  • Coat and jacket organization
  • Cleaning supply storage
  • Vacuum and utility storage
  • Maximized narrow space efficiency

Linen Storage

Keep towels, sheets, and household linens organized and easily accessible.

  • Adjustable shelving for different linen sizes
  • Ventilated shelving options
  • Easy identification and access
  • Bulk storage for extra linens
